    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, androidx.activity.OnBackPressedDispatcherOwner, androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, androidx.core.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, androidx.core.view.KeyEventDispatcher.Component, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, OpenTradeAdapter.RunCurrentTrade, ResponseListener

    public class TradeChatActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
implements ResponseListener, OpenTradeAdapter.RunCurrentTrade
    See Also:
    module for trade chat module Constants.isTradeChatActivity = true then user will receive notification if app is in background or destroyed We have implemented EmojiconEditText for emoji selection #TradeChatDatabaseHelper for offline messgae storage so that user should not wait for message loading from server Firebase Cloud Messasing(FCM) implemented for live chatting with the trader(Buyer/Seller) Also implemented Websocket for live chating but due to some issue we have commented for now

        private void onSelectFromGalleryResult(java.lang.String data,
                                       int msgType,
                                       java.lang.String pdfFileName,
                                       int isOwner)
        Parameters:
        data - - Base64 data for image and text message
        msgType - - will on the selection of message type
        msgType - == 1 == text message base64 data
        msgType - == 2 == image message base64 data
        msgType - == 3 == pdf message base64 data
        pdfFileName - - if message type is pdf then pass the pdf name to the server
        isOwner - - if user is sending message then #isOwner is true #isOwner == 1 == true else false also add coin name with user user requested for the advertisement
        See Also:
        send api requet to tehe server with the given data
